Welcome |PLAYERNAME|! I can help you in many things. Tell {help}
Want to know about {Premium}, {Promotion}, {Map}, {Monsters}, {Spells}, {Rep System} or {Highscores}?

The map has 11 cities: Dorion, Yalahar, Alfon, Venonh, Anknor, Smallville, Infernium, Flam, Saari, Mirand Theraan and Mistyc. You can acessalas through the boat with Captain Owl or magic carpet with Izac.

There are over 10,000 (Ten thousand) monsters around the map, pelomenos half of them in the city of Yalahar this to be a very big city. But in other cities also has a lot of monsters and you will not miss place to level up.
On the server there are spells for all convey both the original and the new, attack, defense, heal, party, etc.. You can buy a spellbook at NPC Dark Road to see all spells that exist on the server.
To get the promotion talk to King Arthas. Say Hail King Promotion and then he will tell you how much it costs.
To purchase Premium only say {!Buypremium}. 90 days cost 0 gold and you can buy up to 360 days of premium.

You can get rep through the command / hail (+5), killing some monsters, killing lvl 30 + PKs (+15), redskulls lvl 30 + (+30) or Blackskulls lvl 30 + (+45). You can lose through Command / fuck (-5) REP, die to another player (+5 or -5) or kill a player without skull.
To know the level highscores just say! Rank, to know the highscores REP just say !ranks.
